headline: Should You Invest in PPL (PPL) Based on Bullish Wall Street Views?
summary: The average brokerage recommendation (ABR) for PPL (PPL) is equivalent to a Buy. The overly optimistic recommendations of Wall Street analysts make the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric questionable. So, is it worth buying the stock?

headline: ClearBridge Mid Cap Strategy Q1 2025 Commentary
summary: The ClearBridge Mid Cap Strategy underperformed its Russell Midcap Index during the first quarter of 2025. Click here to read the full letter.
